title: What happened to clubs?
body:
One game, I had a club tag next to my name. The next, it was gone.

I went onto my profile to check and the club section had been greyed out.

EDIT: Clubs are back now

replies.body: Might be best to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) for this. There doesn't seem to be any issues with Clubs on my end, and this is the first I'm hearing about any trouble with Clubs recently.
